title: request_status Lambda Input (Granule Specific)
description: The output from the request_status Lambda when retrieving status for a particular granule. If multiple jobs match the information given, only the most recent will be returned.

granule_id.description: The unique ID of the granule to retrieve status for.

asyncOperationId.description: The unique ID of the asyncOperation.

files.description: Description and status of the files within the given granule.

file_name.description: The name and extension of the file.

status.description: The status of the restoration of the file. May be 'pending', 'staged', 'success', or 'failed'.

error_message.description: If the restoration of the file errored, the error will be stored here.

restore_destination.description: The name of the glacier bucket the granule is being copied to.

request_time.description: The time, in UTC and isoformat, when the request to restore the granule was initiated.

completion_time.description: The time, in UTC and isoformat, when all granule_files were no longer 'pending'.
